      • displayAddBookableRoomsMenu

        public static void displayAddBookableRoomsMenu​(University university,
                                               java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        university - this has a list of all the Bookable Rooms and will be altered to add the new BookableRoom
        input - this will handle user inputs The idea of this method is that it will output all of the neccessary menu and then handle the inputs to ensure they contain the information required for a new booking input. It will split the input up and check the date is an actual date and then that the time is in the right range and finally that the id is also correct

      • displayRemoveBookableRoomMenu

        public static void displayRemoveBookableRoomMenu​(University university,
                                                 java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        university - this will have a list of all Bookable rooms
        input - this will handle the user inputs This will provide a list of potential empty rooms that can be deleted and send these to be listed, it will then handle the user inputs and remove the Bookable room from the university if the input is valid, otherwise it will call the error menu and recursively call itself

      • displayAddAssistantOnShiftMenu

        public static void displayAddAssistantOnShiftMenu​(University university,
                                                  java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        university - This will contain a a list of Assistants on shift to be added to and a list of the assistants to run through to get an assistant to make the shift
        input - this will handle all the user inputs this is very simular to the other add fucntions and it will run throught the asssitants and have the user enter all the information to make a new assistant on shift , it will then validate all this inforamtion and check it is correct, if so it will add the new assitant on shift

      • displayRemoveAssistantOnShiftMenu

        public static void displayRemoveAssistantOnShiftMenu​(University university,
                                                     java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        university - contains list of assistants on shift to be deleted from
        input - handles all the user inputs This will run through all of the assistants on shift which are avaliable to be deleted and then allow the user to enter which one the user wants to delete The function will then handle this input and if valid will delete it from the list in university

      • displayListBookingMenu

        public static void displayListBookingMenu​(University university,
                                          java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        university - this will contain a list of Bookings to output
        input - this will handle any user input Uses the list function to list out the current bookings for the university, the outputs can be specified by the user to include all of the Bookings, the completed ones or the scheduled ones, by default the function will print out all

      • displayAddBookingMenu

        public static void displayAddBookingMenu​(University university,
                                         java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        university - contains a list of booking to be added to and a list of Bookable rooms and aassitants on shift to assign to the booking
        input - this will handle the user inputs This will run throught the bookable rooms and assistants on shift which have the same time or date and are avaliable and get the user to select on from each list, if these are valid then the booking will be created with the correct information

      • displayRemoveBookingMenu

        public static void displayRemoveBookingMenu​(University university,
                                            java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        university - this will have a list of Bookings to be removed by this function
        input - this will handle the user inputs this will call the list function and get the user to select on from the list of Bookings to be removed, like the functions for removing Bookable rooms and removing assitants on shift

        Parameters:

        input - this will handle the user inputs. This funtion will allow the user to select from a list of Bookings, if valid it will then make the status complete

        university - this is used to recall the system
        Returns:

      • checkDate

        public static boolean checkDate​(java.lang.String inputDate,
                                University university,
                                java.util.Scanner input)
        Parameters:
        inputDate - This will the the date that the user has input or what should have been the date
        university -
        input -
        Returns:
        The return of this obejct will True if the date exists in the gregorian calendar (including dates before its invention for ease), and false if it does not, like if is a leap day on a year that doesnt have a leap day.
